title: Is Ariana Grande at the Grammys? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes!!! Ariana Grande has only won One Grammy Award so far. At the 61st Annual Grammy Awards (2019), she won the Best Pop Vocal Album for her 2018 album “Sweetener”. Sources: Grammy Award for Best Pop Vocal Album - Wikipedia Sweetener (album) - Wikipedia Grammys 2019: Ariana Grande Wins First Grammy (Warning: Article contains foul language)
